description.author: Salesforce
text: Component that displays a dynamic table with data fetched based on a query, provides a spinner while loading, shows a message when there's no data, and allows for infinite scrolling to load more data. It also includes an accordion component for query input.

elements.name: loadingSpinner
elements.description: Represents a loading spinner displayed while data is being fetched.

elements.name: dataTable
elements.description: Represents the main data table component for displaying fetched data.

elements.name: noResultMessage
elements.description: Represents a message displayed when there is no data to show in the table.

elements.name: queryAccordion
elements.description: Represents an accordion component for inputting and changing the query.

text: Check that the no result message is present and visible
